features: Start your day off right: Our Vitamin C serum for face blends Vitamin C with Hyaluronic Acid and MSM; this serum helps even skin tone, neutralize free radicals and boost collagen to improve radiance and reduce dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles

Rejuvenate at night: This retinol serum works as an anti aging serum with retinoid, (Vitamin A), Vitamin E, Gotu Kola and hyaluronic acid; anti aging serum for face made to improve skin tone, texture, hyperpigmentation and hydration levels

How to use: Apply 3-5 drops of face serum to clean skin; first-time retinol serum for face users should start applying only 2-3 times per week; avoid contact with eyes and always patch test facial skin care products 24 hours before use; external use only. Apply SPF daily

Blended to be better: This skin care set is a balanced medley of key antioxidants, super-nutrients and nourishing botanical actives to enhance efficacy and deliver skin-friendly benefits, without unnecessary additives or fragrances; dermatologist-tested & cruelty-free

The TruSkin difference: If for any reason you decide this product isn't a fit for your skin, we're here for you. Each purposefully balanced medley of key antioxidants, super-nutrients and nourishing botanical actives enhances efficacy and delivers skin-friendly benefits, without additives or fragrances

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am 53. I wish I would have taken before pictures, but I thought it would be like every other product I’ve tried. My Brown spots are almost gone and my skin looks amazing!! While sitting with a coworker at lunch today, she said, “I’m sorry if I’m staring at you, but your skin looks amazing!!! We are the same age, right?”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: PSA!! Always patch test!!That being said I have issues with hyperpigmentation, wrinkless,lines, dullness and my skin just looking terrible. Omg I love that I bought these items!First of all I did feel a bit of burning, around the mouth and I was burnt so I allowed my skin to heal and try again but using less of it and immediately following up with a moisturizer.I use the retinol 3 times and weak and the vitamin c daily. It's amazing. I start with a cleaning foam, followed by a toner, then the vitamin c, let it dry, then retinol let that dry then moisturizer. I bought it in August and didn't start seeing results until October. Guys, pace yourself slow down and be patient. Btw I have combination skin and I never leave my house without a sunscreen... Always use a sun screen!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value, good product
reviews.reviewText: I am on my second order of the Retinol Serum & Vitamin C Serum combo. Use the retinol at night and vitamin C in the morning. I have sensitive skin and applied as directly with no issues. Good product and feel it is reducing wrinkles and age spots

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This vitamin c is the absolute TRUTH! You will notice a difference quickly.My skin misses this serum if not used regularly. The retinol is gentle on my skin and really does a great job.I highly recommend this product line. If you need help understanding what your skin needs please go to their website as it is very helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: Best serum for the money! This is the third order great results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Retinol contains alcohol. A dangerous ingredient to apply on the skin
reviews.reviewText: Retinol contains alcohol. Dangerous for the skin. The skin absorb the alcohol. It goes into your body. You do not ingest alcohol. Besides; it contains Carrageenan which can causes gut tumors and ulcers, and may can Tiger colon cancer. Before buying a product do your own research. I started doing mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My skin looks so much better!
reviews.reviewText: I will admit, I was skeptical as to whether using these products would really show any improvement in my skin. I've been using it several weeks now and I've got to say, I'm impressed with the results. My wrinkles are not as noticeable and my skin is smoother and brighter. I'll be a repeat customer for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto la testura la piel lo absorbe rápidamente m en canto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Don't use if you have any skin sensitivities
reviews.reviewText: I liked both serums however the retinol badly reacted with the skin on my neck
